task.en: Help me use iMovie to remove the audio from `/Users/ec2-user/Documents/benchmark_files/Multimedia/1147775047-1-208.mp4`. Then export to Documents/Silent.mp4 with 1080p resolution, high quality and faster compression.
task.zh: 帮我用iMovie把`/Users/ec2-user/Documents/benchmark_files/Multimedia/1147775047-1-208.mp4`的声音去除掉。随后导出到Documents/Silent.mp4，使用1080p分辨率，高质量，faster压缩。

pre_command: osascript -e 'quit app "iMovie"' && rm -rf "/Users/ec2-user/Movies/iMovie Library.imovielibrary" && cp -r "/Users/ec2-user/Benchmark_Backup/iMovie Library.imovielibrary" /Users/ec2-user/Movies/; rm -rf /Users/ec2-user/Documents/benchmark_files/ && cp -r /Users/ec2-user/Benchmark_Backup/benchmark_files /Users/ec2-user/Documents; osascript -e 'tell application "iMovie" to activate' && sleep 5 && osascript -e 'tell application "System Events" to keystroke "f" using {control down, command down}'
grading_command: if [[ $(mdls -name kMDItemVideoBitRate /Users/ec2-user/Documents/Silent.mp4 2>/dev/null) == *"19276"* && $(mdls -name kMDItemMediaTypes /Users/ec2-user/Documents/Silent.mp4 2>/dev/null) == *"Video"* && $(mdls -name kMDItemMediaTypes /Users/ec2-user/Documents/Silent.mp4 2>/dev/null) != *"Sound"* ]]; then echo "True"; else echo "False"; fi
